code: import{useMemo}from"react";var useFilterIngredient=function useFilterIngredient(ingredients,targetType){return useMemo(function(){return ingredients?ingredients.filter(function(_ref){var type=_ref.type;return type===targetType;}):[];},[ingredients,targetType]);};export var useGroupIngredients=function useGroupIngredients(ingredients){return{buns:useFilterIngredient(ingredients,"bun"),sauces:useFilterIngredient(ingredients,"sauce"),mains:useFilterIngredient(ingredients,"main")};};
